gui.autowalk.title: Auto Walking
autowalk.config.show_hud.tooltip:
Whether show message horizontally centered on the screen when auto walking.
[Default: true]
autowalk.config.hud_offset_y.tooltip:
The vertical offset from the top of the screen.
[Default: 10]
autowalk.config.auto_jump.tooltip:
When set to true, player can auto jump when auto walking.
When set to false, it will depend on the vanilla settings.
[Default: true]
